articles.description: Lando Norris did not let a cut nose dampen his celebrations after winning his first British Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lando Norris' British Grand Prix win 'means huge amount' as Oscar Piastri stews over penalty

articles.description: Wimbledon organisers apologise after the electronic line-calling system on Centre Court is turned off in error and misses three calls in one game.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Organisers apologise after missing three calls after electronic line-calling system deactivated in one game

articles.description: After taking two steps forward last week, England have taken another back in their crushing loss to India. BBC Sport explores the issues holding them back.
articles.title: England vs India: Familiar issues are halting the progress of Ben Stokes' side

articles.description: Mathieu van der Poel edges out Tadej Pogacar in a sprint finish to win stage two of the Tour de France and claim the leader's yellow jersey.
articles.title: Tour de France: Mathieu van der Poel edges out  Tadej Pogacar in sprint finish to win stage two

articles.description: Kevin Durant joins the Houston Rockets from the Phoenix Suns in a record-breaking NBA trade deal.
articles.title: Kevin Durant joins Houston Rockets from Phoenix Suns in NBA record trade

articles.description: The final day of the German Track Cycling Championships is abandoned after several spectators are injured when two cyclists crash into the crowd.
articles.title: German Track Cycling Championships abandoned after cyclists crash into crowd

articles.description: Australia beat West Indies by 133 runs in Grenada to take an unassailable 2-0 lead in their three-Test series.
articles.title: Australia beat West Indies in second Test to seal series win

articles.description:
With Arsenal hoping to sign the final piece to complete the jigsaw puzzle of their midfield, BBC Sport looks at what they would be getting with
Martin Zubimendi.
articles.title: Martin Zubimendi: What Arsenal are getting with Real Sociedad midfielder

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says the Ferrari he drove in the wet-dry British Grand Prix "was the most difficult car I've driven in these conditions".
articles.title: British Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton says Ferrari was 'most difficult car I've driven in these conditions'

articles.description: Cameron Norrie is the final Briton standing in the Wimbledon singles after beating Chile's Nicolas Jarry to reach the men's quarter-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Cameron Norrie beats Nicolas Jarry to keep British interest going at All England Club
